item.title: Nvidia Rides AI Boom to Become Latest U.S. $1 Trillion Company
item.description: Nvidia, a chipmaker that specializes in artificial intelligence (AI), has become the seventh U.S. company to reach a valuation of over $1 trillion. The company’s stock price has surged in recent months, thanks to strong demand for its chips used in AI and other high-performance computing applications.

item.title: OpenAI CEO Calls for Collaboration With China to Counter AI Risks
item.description: OpenAI CEO Calls for Collaboration With China to Counter AI Risks OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has called for collaboration between the United States and China on artificial intelligence (AI). Altman believes that AI is a “global problem” that requires a “global solution.

item.title: Hedge Funds Increase Bullish Bets on Oil
item.description: Hedge Funds Increase Bullish Bets on Oil Hedge funds have increased their bullish bets on oil prices in recent weeks, amid Saudi Arabia’s surprise decision to cut oil output. The number of hedge funds with bullish bets on oil rose to 72 in the week ended June 6, from 66 in the previous week, according to data from the Commodity Futures Trading Commission.

item.title: Musk Can't Stop Talking About the Nonstop Grind
item.description: Musk’s Work Ethic: A Recipe for Success or Burnout? Elon Musk is known for his long hours and demanding work ethic. He has often said that hard work is essential for success, and he has pushed his employees to work long hours as well.
